title: Pittsburgh Pirates average ticket price 2006 to 2019
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, with a total of 13 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2016 to 2011.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is moderately neutral which exists from 2009 to 2006.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2019 to 2016.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is moderately neutral which exists from 2011 to 2009.
gold: This graph depicts the average ticket price for Pittsburgh Pirates games in Major League Baseball from 2006 to 2019 . In 2019 , the average ticket price was at 22.81 U.S. dollars .
